title: FTF (First Time Fix): Why It Is the Single Most Critical Metric for Maintenance Profitability

hero_image.alt: Hero image for FTF (First Time Fix): Why It Is the Single Most Critical Metric for Maintenance Profitability

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse maintenance technician (mid-30s, wearing safety glasses, a hard hat, and a high-visibility vest) is kneeling next to a large industrial motor or pump. They are looking at a tablet held in their left hand (screen not visible to the viewer) while holding a wrench in their right hand, appearing confident and prepared. In the background, slightly out of focus, other facility operations are ongoing with automated machinery. The lighting is professional, combining cool industrial blue tones with warm task lighting on the equipment. No text or overlays.
